trans-unit.source: Defines methods that provide information about debugger objects.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來提供偵錯工具物件資訊的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by all <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> objects that are implemented by the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯工具實作的所有 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 物件都會實作這個介面。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this interface serves only to flag these objects as such to the scripting engine.
trans-unit.target: 目前這個介面只用來向指令碼引擎標示這類物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to search for.
When implemented in a class, determines whether the current object has a member that has the specified name and that is enumerable.
trans-unit.target: 在類別中實作時，判斷目前物件是否具有指定之名稱而且可列舉的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object has an enumerable member named <paramref name="name" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前物件具有名為 <paramref name="name" /> 的可列舉成員，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, determines whether the current object is a true COM object or a proxy to a managed object.
trans-unit.target: 在類別中實作時，判斷目前物件是合乎標準的 COM 物件還是 Managed 物件的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object is a COM object; <see langword="false" /> if the current object is a proxy to a managed object.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前物件為 COM 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果目前物件為 Managed 物件的 Proxy，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要測試是否相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, determines whether the current object is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 在類別中實作時，判斷目前物件是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object is the same as <paramref name="o" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前物件與 <paramref name="o" /> 相同則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, determines whether the current object is a proxy to a managed JScript function.
trans-unit.target: 在類別中實作時，判斷目前物件是否為 Managed JScript 函式的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object is a proxy to a managed JScript function; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前物件為 Managed JScript 函式的 Proxy，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, determines whether the current object is a proxy to a managed JScript object.
trans-unit.target: 在類別中實作時，判斷目前物件是否為 Managed JScript 物件的 Proxy。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current object is a proxy to a managed JScript object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前物件為 Managed JScript 物件的 Proxy，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
